categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Alkin Saad was a male Human Padawan training within the Jedi Order during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

A Force-sensitive Human, Alkin Saad was trained in the ways of the Force at the Jedi Order experimental Academy on the planet Almas in the Cularin system. Selected as the Padawan of the Duros Jedi Master Tantron Dow, the pair were sent on a mission to investigate the disappearance of several Jedi in the Almas Wastelands in 31 BBY. During their search, the landspeeder Saad was piloting was shot down by a laser cannon operated by members of the Believers cult, killing Saad and injuring Dow.
